#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
	double fact[1000002];
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;

	 fact[0]=0;
	//fact array is to store the value of log of factorials of all the numbers
	for(int i=1;i<1000002;i++)
	{
		fact[i]=fact[i-1]+log(i);
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		k=(k<n-k)?k:n-k;
		double d=(n-1)*log(2);//stores value of 2^n-1
		double ans=0.0;
		for(int i=k;i>=0;i--)
		{
			double temp=exp(fact[n]-fact[n-i]-fact[i]-d);//computes and stores (n!/(n-r)!r!)
			ans+=temp;
		}
		ans*=100;
		printf("%.1lf\n",ans);
	}
}
